commit_message: fix(build): add missing include directory with library headers

primary_error.error_message: cannot convert 'mqi::mqi_standard_rng*' {aka 'std::mersenne_twister_engine<long unsigned int, 64, 312, 156, 31, 13043109905998158313, 29, 6148914691236517205, 17, 8202884508482404352, 37, 18444473444759240704, 43, 6364136223846793005>*'} to 'mqi::mqi_rng*' {aka 'std::linear_congruential_engine<long unsigned int, 16807, 0, 2147483647>*'} in initialization
primary_error.root_cause: Type mismatch between random number generator implementations - mqi_standard_rng vs mqi_rng

call_stack.template_args: R = float; size_t = long unsigned int; uint32_t = unsigned int

suggested_approach.description: Need to align random number generator types across the framework
possible_solutions: Update mqi_rng type alias to match mqi_standard_rng
Modify threads structure to use consistent RNG type
Add type conversion utilities for RNG compatibility
Refactor RNG abstraction layer for type safety

next_steps.immediate_action: Call CI_Debugger to analyze and fix the RNG type mismatch
required_files: RNG type definitions and usage across framework
next_steps.validation: After fix, ensure CI passes compilation and basic tests succeed
